TEST.name: Reco_trf_SLHC_single_particle_reco
TEST.options_atn: Reco_trf.py inputRDOFile=test.RDO.pool.root topOptions=InDetSLHC_Example/jobOptions_tracking_SLHC_trf_UtopiaTest.py preExec_r2e='InDetFlags.writeRDOs.set_Value_and_Lock(True)' outputESDFile=testESD.root outputAODFile=testAOD.root outputDESDM_TRACKFile=OUT.D3PD.root maxEvents=5 --omitvalidation=ALL --test
TEST.author: John Chapman
